DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of olanzapine versus placebo in the continuation therapy of subjects with major depression who had a response with additional olanzapine to an antidepressant.
DOC.brief_title: Optimal Duration of Olanzapine Add-on Therapy in Major Depression
